wonBet.wonBet2: Congratulations, you won @amount on a bet
wonBet.wonBet3: Congratulations, you beat @user and won a bet
wonBet.wonBet4: Congratulations, you beat @user and @user in bets

lostBet.lostBet2: Congratulations, you won @amount on a bet
lostBet.lostBet3: Congratulations, you beat @user and won a bet
